original_text: and Jacob offered a sacrifice in the hill country and called his kinsmen to eat bread. They ate bread and spent the night in the hill country.
korean_text: 야곱이 또 산에서 제사를 드리고 형제들을 불러 떡을 먹이니 그들이 떡을 먹고 산에서 밤을 지내고

sentences.original_text: and Jacob offered a sacrifice in the hill country
and called his kinsmen to eat bread.
and spent the night in the hill country.
